r.d: Provides bindings to the functions of libssh2 which implements the SSH2 protocol. libssh2 is available from http://www.sourceforge.net/projects/libssh2
r.n: - Support for latest libssh2 release - Fix build with PHP 5.3 - Fixed incorrect return values for rename/unlink/mkdir/rmdir with sftp functions/streams - Fixed various memory leaks and segfaults
